review: I am unable to get to the payment gateway page, it just keeps redirecting me to the checkout cart. It is frustrating because I have tried multiple stuff to get it resolved but it doesn't get resolved!!

I am unable to get to the payment gateway page, it just keeps redirecting me to the checkout cart. It is frustrating because I have tried multiple stuff to get it resolved but it doesn't get resolved!!
The delivery time is never as shown, takes too long to deliver. Please fix this
My order was given to given to wrong house multiple times
Unable to contact delivery person and customer support not helping at all! nEVER ABLE TO get in touch with agents
Happy with the service provided, delivery has always been on time
I like the service provided but would have loved if there was a functionality to directly call the delivery partner
Food received from restaurant was stale, very bad ,zomato needs to cut off bad restaurant
I am a pure vegetarian but got non veg delivered!!!! this is unacceptable
the app takes too long to load, please fix asap
i have downloaded the app but it is not opening up keeps on showing me the loader icon
